name: GLITCH DRIVE
description:
Goal: Find the helicopter and escape!

You are a cyborg trying to escape an unstable world.
The helicopter is your only escape.

Controls: Use WASD to run.
Spacebar while running to dash!

Credits: 

Cope – Lead Programmer

Memes – Programmer & Map Designer

Ricky Owings – Music

TheFlanMan – Art and Graphics

This was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.
